content.description: The business cycle diagram below shows the cyclical movement of actual real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> relative to potential real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> over time for the nation of Fisherland.
content.question: The economy of Fisherland is at full employment for which year in the above diagram?

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
